abstract: There are few situations more horrible than having to tell another human being that he or she is going to die. And it doesn't get any easier with experience, writes Dr. Danielle Ofri.
snippet: There are few situations more horrible than having to tell another human being that he or she is going to die. And it doesn't get any easier with experience, writes Dr. Danielle Ofri.

headline.main: 'So, Doc, How Much Time I Got?'
